input.sentences: two of the best coffee makers in berlin met up to compare techniques .
they both had different techniques but decided to come up with a shared idea for the best cup of coffee .
they shook hands on the deal out of respect for each other 's coffee making skills .
this is the first version of their new creation .
before they try to bring it to competitions they decided to sell it in both of their own restaurants .
output.sentences: today there is an event going on
everyone is preparing for a event
this is the cost of today's beverages
